room_plot: I just woke up lying on a comfortable [recliner]. In front of me is a [office-desk]; left side is a large [french-window]; right side is the [studio] [door].
Clean and white [ceiling] can be reached with little hopping. The size of [studio] is only 6 square meter. Who can live in such a cramped position?
Anyway, I have to escape here.
studio_plot: This is a low ceiling room.
ceiling_plot: There's a sentence writing on the ceiling
Ang unang duha ka numero mao ang 45
french-window_plot: I still have fresh air to breathe.
door_plot: There's a (lock) on the door. It seems that it has both card sensing and digital password function.
office-desk_plot: I like the classic long black oak desk. There's a [notebook] placed on it.
door_lock_open_plot: The door lock made a 'beep' sound.
notebook_plot: Nothing on it except a small number, 79.
inspect: Enter"`inspect` [room/place/object](attachment)" to obtain the object's plot.
